personalDetails.title: Personal details
personalDetails.name: Your name
personalDetails.pictureInstructions: If you wish, you may upload your profile picture. Supported file formats: .png, .jpg, .jpeg, .svg, .webp.

password.title: Let's make your account secure
password.2FAInstructions: 2-Factor-Authentication, or 2FA, is a great way to secure your account against potential hackers.

methods.title: Choose your 2FA methods
methods.passkeyNote: Note: Passkeys simplify login, but do not add extra security.

2FA.title: Your authenticator app code
2FA.instructions: Download or open an authenticator app, such as Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, etc. and scan
2FA.notScannable: If you cannot scan this QR code, please enter this secret code manually into your authenticator app: <1>{code}</1>
2FA.6digitCodeInstructions: Please enter the 6-digit passcode shown in your authenticator app

company.title: Your company
company.name: Company name
company.logoInstructions: If you wish, you may upload your company's logo to replace B9 Launchpad logo throughout the panel.
